name: Element Earth (Android)
description:
Element Earth is a fast-paced mobile arcade shooter. Defend Earth at all costs as it enters a chaotic asteroid storm unlike anything before. With the entire planet's missiles at your command and a handful of the best Earth scientists, blast your way to freedom and unlock fantastic new technologies along the way to help mankind survive!

Maybe this is the end for us, maybe not. The fate of Earth and all mankind is at your fingertips.

Good luck commander!

Features

  • Haptic effects powered by Immersion Corporation.
  • Increased difficulty as time progresses.
  • Fast paced arcade action.
  • Music by Eric Matyas.
  • Hardcore mode.
  • Upgrades.
  • Free access to Video Game Development tools and tutorials.

Requirements

  • Open network sockets
  • Access information about networks
  • Access the vibration feature
  • Connect to paired bluetooth devices
  • Android 2.3
